directions: The trailhead for Cirque Lake trail located at the far end of Callaghan Lake, so canoe or kayak required to reach it from parking at Callaghan Lake campground, which is located 38k north of Squamish, look for the highway sign for Whistler Olympic Park. Turn left from Highway 99, drive  for about 8 minutes. The sign for Callaghan Lake just before Whistler Olympic Park, turn left, cross a bridge and drive logging road for 8km.
title: Cirque Lake
